itemDescription: British zoologist and Professor of Mathematical Biology at the University of Oxford

wikipedia_page.main: Dame Angela Ruth McLean  (born 31 May 1961) is professor of mathematical biology in the Department of Zoology at the University of Oxford, and Chief Scientific Adviser to the Ministry of Defence.

response: * MOD Chief Scientific Adviser Dame Angela McLean
* Angela McLean (biologist), University of Oxford Professor of Mathematical Biology
